mapper.insert: insert into SYSTEM_CODE (CODE_ID, CODE_MYID, NAME, SORT, TYPE, ICONCLS, STATE, PERMISSIONID, PARENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER ) values (#{codeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{codeMyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastmod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select CODE_ID, CODE_MYID, NAME, SORT, TYPE, ICONCLS, STATE, PERMISSIONID, PARENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER from SYSTEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 ${_parameter}
mapper.update: update SYSTEM_CODE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_MYID= #{codeMyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICONCLS= #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT=#{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYER=#{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMOD=#{lastmod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CODE_ID= #{codeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select CODE_ID, CODE_MYID, NAME, SORT, TYPE, ICONCLS, STATE, PERMISSIONID, PARENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER from SYSTEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS='A' AND CODE_ID= #{codeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select CODE_ID, CODE_MYID, NAME, SORT, TYPE, ICONCLS, STATE, PERMISSIONID, PARENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER from SYSTEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS='A' AND CODE_MYID= #{codeMyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CODE_ID,NAME from SYSTEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS='A' ${_parameter}
select CODE_ID,NAME from SYSTEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS='A' ${_parameter}

select CODE_ID, CODE_MYID, NAME, SORT, TYPE, ICONCLS, STATE, PERMISSIONID, PARENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER from SYSTEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS='A' AND PARENT_ID= #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
